el-tigre.name: LA LAGARTIJA
el-tigre.describe: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavor.

el-tigre.name: EL TIGRE
el-tigre.describe: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourments. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit peanuts with caramel.

el-tigre.name: LA CUCARACHA
el-tigre.describe: Sweet and intense with a big amonut of different flavors. Caramel, grapes, strawberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer day.
